title: Khloe Kardashian gets heads turning as she works VERY tall leather boots
text:
She seems to always have heads turning, no matter where she goes.

And Tuesday was no exception for Khloe Kardashian.

Rocking an exceptionally high pair of leather boots, the reality star, 35, was serving some serious edge while heading to lunch at Malibu Farm Pier Cafe.

These boots were REALLY made for walking! Khloe Kardashian worked a very thigh-high pair of boots in Malibu

Along with a pair of skin tight leggings and an alligator print jacket, Khloe was the picture of cool.

Even her long nails were polished in black.

Khloe managed to soften up the look with a head full of loose, romantic curls.

The reality star was walking like a model on the runway as she strutted towards the beachfront restaurant.

Curl power! She managed to soften up the edgy style with a head full of romantic ringlets

Khloe appeared alone, and without her precious one-year-old daughter True.

The star shares the child with her ex-boyfriend Tristan Thompson, who she split with earlier this year after multiple cheating scandals.

In spite of all the heartache, Khloe says she has no desire to come between Tristan and their daughter.

Walk this way! Khloe's black leggings left little to the imagination

'It's hard, it's not easy for me. It would be easier for me to keep my daughter away and be like, "No, 'cause you hurt me,"' Khloe said on a recent episode of Jay Shetty's On Purpose podcast.

'But, he never hurt True, him and I have our own relationship, and then Tristan and True have theirs. And I will never come in-between that, I don't believe in that.'

Khloe says she learned a lot about co-parenting from her parents, Kris Jenner and Robert Kardashian, who divorced in 1991 after 13 years of marriage.

'I attest that to my parents, [who] were incredible co-parenters, from what I know. My mum and my dad, I'm sure, fought all the time, not around us.'
description: Rocking an exceptionally high pair of leather boots, the reality star, 35, was serving some serious edge while heading to lunch at Malibu Farm Pier Cafe. Even her long nails were polished in black.
